Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class ExtraProductsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.ExtraProductsController
public class ExtraProductsController extends Object
This class is used to be able to manage the data, methods, buttons and combo boxes used in the execution screen of the secondary products' menu.
Author:
Jefersson Coronel

    • updateDBOrders

      public void updateDBOrders(DBOrders dbOrders) throws FileNotFoundException
      This method will be used to update the database orders to the one received from the HomeOrder with all the orders from the different screens.
      Parameters:
      dbOrders - the dbOrders with the data orders updated.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

      private boolean verifyIsThereOrder(Order order)
      This method is used to verify is there any order replied in case there is return the boolean is in list.
      Parameters:
      order - This attribute is used to check if there is a matching order.
      Returns:
      This attribute is a boolean value is in list to verify the new order.

    • addOrderIfNotfound

      private void addOrderIfNotfound(boolean isThereOrder, Order order)
      This method is used to add order if there isn't any order equals.
      Parameters:
      isThereOrder - This parameter is used to check is there in list.
      order - This order is added in case there isn't any equals.

    • addNewOrderDrink

      public void addNewOrderDrink(ExtraDrink extraDrink, ExtraDrinkQuantity extraDrinkQuantity)
      This method is used to create a new order of type drink when the continue button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      extraDrink - This parameter is used to save on the order of type drink its attributes.
      extraDrinkQuantity - This parameter is used to save the quantity of Drink on the order and get its attributes.

    • addNewOrderMeal

      public void addNewOrderMeal(ExtraMealPortion extraMealPortion, ExtrasSizable extrasSizable)
      This method is used to create a new order of type meal when the continue button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      extraMealPortion - This parameter is used to save on the order of type meal its attributes..
      extrasSizable - This parameter is used to save the size of general extras on the order and get its attributes.

    • putOptionsInGeneralList

      private void putOptionsInGeneralList(ArrayList<String> listOptions, ArrayList<ExtrasSizable> extrasSizable, ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.ComboBox> comboBoxesList)
      This method is used to put the options in the appropriate comboBox, in this case the options will be added in the general extra type combo boxes.
      Parameters:
      listOptions - This list is of type string like options will be used to do actions.
      extrasSizable - This attribute is a list of options where new options will be implemented.
      comboBoxesList - The combo boxes will add actions.

    • putInDrinkListOptions

      Parameters:
      listOptions - this list is of type string like options will be used to do actions.
      comboBoxesList - the combo boxes will add actions.

      Parameters:
      listOfComboBox - This attribute is the list where we are going to put the options of the respective combo boxes.
      list - This attribute is the list where the options are stored it is used to add to the list of options of the combo box.
